pageContext.claim: “We like Nevada but you got a governor there that's a player. And, even if you want to speak they make it very hard to find a location, but we found one and 50,000 people showed up a couple of weeks ago.”
pageContext.analysis: The Nevada Independent reported: "Campaign and law enforcement officials estimated there were 13,000 people who turned out to the rally on a warm October day" when Trump spoke in Carson City on Oct. 18, ten days before Trump made these remarks. The rally "comes just a few weeks after Trump held similarly large rallies in Minden and in Henderson in violation of the state’s limits on public gatherings. Most rally goers at the Sunday event did not wear masks."
